SCTX:
Begin FastEddieAmulet

short currentDay
short daysPassed

if ( GetJournalIndex HT_EddieAmulet != 50 )
	StopScript FastEddieAmulet
	Return
endif

if ( currentDay != Day )
	Set currentDay to Day
	Set daysPassed to daysPassed + 1
	;if a day has passed, increment. does this once automatically.
endif

if ( daysPassed > 5 )
	;when the number of days to the quest pass, do this stuff:
	Journal HT_EddieAmulet 70
endif

End

End
